changeSet.author: jacky
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE applejuice.`user` ( id BIGINT auto_increment NOT NULL, username varchar(100) NOT NULL, password varchar(100) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT user_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

changeSet.author: jacky
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE applejuice.auth ( id BIGINT auto_increment NOT NULL, `role` varchar(100) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT auth_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

changeSet.author: jacky
jacky
changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW applejuice.view_auth_user AS SELECT rau.id AS id, a.id AS auth_id, a.role AS auth_role, u.id AS user_id, u.username AS user_username, u.password AS user_password FROM applejuice.user u JOIN applejuice.rel_auth_user rau ON u.id = rau.user_id JOIN applejuice.auth a ON rau.auth_id = a.id;

changeSet.author: jacky
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE applejuice.permission ( id BIGINT auto_increment NOT NULL, resource varchar(100) NULL, operation varchar(100) NULL, CONSTRAINT permission_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

changeSet.author: jacky
jacky
changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW applejuice.view_auth_permission AS SELECT rap.id AS id, a.id AS auth_id, a.role AS auth_role, p.id AS permission_id, p.resource AS permission_resource, p.operation AS permission_operation FROM applejuice.permission p JOIN applejuice.rel_auth_permission rap ON p.id = rap.permission_id JOIN applejuice.auth a ON rap.auth_id = a.id;

changeSet.author: jacky
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE applejuice.product ( id BIGINT auto_increment NOT NULL, name varchar(100) NOT NULL, description TEXT NULL, price BIGINT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT product_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=1;
